title: MarQ By Flipkart 338 L Frost Free Double Door 2 Star Convertible Refrigerator  (Sliver Steel, 340JF2MQDS)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Refrigerator Unit, User Manual, Egg Tray, Ice Box
product_specification.Other Features: 360 Degree Food Freshness, Multi Air Flow Technology, Coldest Freezer Temperature, Turbo Chill Technology, Silver Ion Based Deodorizer, 100 - 290 V Voltage Range, Easy Glide Drawer for Easy Operation, Internal Load Sensor, Door Usage Sensor, Ambient Temperature Sensor, 6 Step Inverter Compresser, Soft LED Light, 0 ODP
product_specification.Installation & Demo: Explain all the functionality of the product||Flipkart will facilitate Installation & Demo at time of your convenience from a brand authorized service engineer||All additional accessories which are not part of the the package will be charged separately||Flipkart will communicate the day and time slot of the scheduled Installation & Demo through a SMS and the same information will also be available in your order details page||Please note that any unauthorized handling or self-installation of the product will lead to return & product warranty being void.||The Installation & Demo service will be provided free of cost.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product and 10 Years on Compressor Warranty From MarQ by Flipkart
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence.

product_description.Large Capacity: This refrigerator’s 338 L capacity makes it suitable for a family of three to five members. So, all the leftovers, veggies, and much more can be easily stored without any hassles.
product_description.Frost-free Cooling: Thanks to this refrigerator’s frost-free cooling feature, it auto-defrosts the freezer to curb ice buildup. So, you can freeze meat, peas, cold cuts, and much more without ice.

review: Surely its a best product in this price range far better than brands like samsung the best feature of this product is its cooling capacity which is just fantastic and its design and storage capacity is also good just go for it its technology partner is panasonic which is in itself a renowned brand

Very good product value for money and very good design and colour I like this product thanks for Flipkart and delevry boy was very good and demo boys performec was good I need Bihar sharif in supporting coustmor care any problem this product I need call you help this any problem other was good thank for very very Flipkart

Good frost free refrigerator at this budget range.
1. Design and colour is good but not excellent. No other colour option.
2. It does the performance so for.
3. Interior build quality is good.
4. Very less noise or no noise during compressor is on.
5. Storage space is decent for 3-4 family members
Thanks for the flipkart for the best deal.

A nice silent sturdy product at a very budget friendly price, the only fault being that both the doors do not close automatically and needs to be closed manually with a push. Installation was fast within 24 hours and both delivery and installation staffs were very courteous.

COLLING OF REFRIGERATOR GOOD & RIGHT .COLOUR IS LOOK VERY GOOD . CAPACITY IS VERY GOOD. HANDLE OF REFIGERATOR IS VERY GOOD FROM WITHIN REFIGERATOR.
ICE COMPARTMENT IS VERY GOOD & CAPACITY OF ICE COMPARTMENT IS VERY GOOD.
SHELF IS VERY THIN .SHELF NEED TO IMPROVE
NEED TO IMPROVE BOTTLE SECTION OF REFIGERATOR.BUT THEIR IS NO BIG BOTTLE(2LI) SECTION.

If you want an silent device. This is the best choice. It's cool design is loving .

Veg basket is impressive.



It can earn 100/100 if it have a door lock.


It is good device . I can bet if anybody can tell when it compressor is on or off by standing near.

No noise even in night too.
Very nice refrigerator,no voice,large vegitable basket, overall space wise comfort for 5-6 family members to use... thanks, very good service by Jeeves during call/installation
